admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia
subsc: General industry and trade sector,General agriculture, fishing and forestry sector,Central government administration,Power,General transportation sector
trustfund: TF031198-ALBANIA - CRITICAL IMPORTS PROJECT,TF031197-ALBANIA - CRITICAL IMPORTS,TF022695-CRITICAL IMPORTS PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Critical Imports Project's
            objective is to help maintain and increase capacity
            utilization and production in key productive sectors during
            the next 12 to 18 months. The project will provide critical
            goods and materials to enable vital sectors of the economy
            to continue to operate. It will finance the priority import
            requirements of the agriculture and power sectors. The
            agriculture component provides urgent inputs for crop and
            poultry/egg production in 1992/93; spare parts for
            agricultural mechanization and irrigation. The power
            component will provide materials and equipment for: repairs
            of generating plants; rehabilitation of the transmission
            system; improvements in the dispatching/monitoring system;
            and rehabilitation of the distribution network in Tirana,
            Shkoder, and Durres. The transport component includes spare
            parts, batteries and tires for trucks; spare parts for the
            port at Durres, and telecommunications systems for the
            railways. Finally, under the general administration
            component, the project will finance imports of office
            equipment for the public entities involved in project implementation.
